propDescriptions.color: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component.
propDescriptions.defaultChecked: The default checked state. Use when the component is not controlled.
propDescriptions.endDecorator: The element that appears at the end of the switch.
propDescriptions.onChange:
Callback fired when the state is changed.

Signature:
function(event: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => void
event: The event source of the callback. You can pull out the new value by accessing event.target.value (string). You can pull out the new checked state by accessing event.target.checked (boolean).
propDescriptions.readOnly: If true, the component is read only.
propDescriptions.startDecorator: The element that appears at the end of the switch.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.
